remarks: Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number. Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1999.) (Proof shortened by Paul Chapman, 25-Jan-2008.)
statement:
ltplus1.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
prodgt0.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
ltmul1.3 $e |- C e. RR $.
ltmul1i.4 $e |- 0 < C $.
ltmul1ii $p |- ( A < B <-> ( A x. C ) < ( B x. C ) ) $.
